  • Method Details

    • getDigitalSignature

      DigitalSignature getDigitalSignature(int id)
      Retrieves a digital signature from the database based on its ID.

      This method retrieves the digital signature associated with the given `id` from the database. The signature image, if present, is decrypted before being returned. If the signature image is not encrypted in the database (perhaps due to legacy data), this method attempts to encrypt it and update the database for future access.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the digital signature to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved `DigitalSignature` object, or `null` if no such entity exists or if an error occurs during * decrypting/encrypting the SignatureImage.

    • saveDigitalSignature

      DigitalSignature saveDigitalSignature(Integer facilityId, String providerNo, Integer demographicNo, byte[] imageData, ModuleType moduleType)
      Saves a digital signature to the database.

      This method saves a new digital signature to the database. The provided `imageData` is encrypted before being stored. The digital signature is associated with the specified `facilityId`, `providerNo`, and `demographicNo`.

      Parameters:
      facilityId - The ID of the facility associated with the signature.
      providerNo - The providers's number associated with the signature.
      demographicNo - The ID of the demographic entity associated with the signature.
      imageData - The byte array representing the signature image.
      moduleType - ModuleType The module from which the signature originated.
      Returns:
      The saved `DigitalSignature` object, including the generated ID.

      Note, Encrypted imageData will be populated in the object returned.

      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs during encryption or saving the signature.

    • processAndSaveDigitalSignature

      DigitalSignature processAndSaveDigitalSignature(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, String signatureRequestId, Integer demographicNo, ModuleType moduleType)
      Processes and saves a digital signature from a temporary file to the database.

      This method retrieves a digital signature image from a temporary file, encrypts it, and saves it to the database. The signature is associated with the logged-in user's facility and providers number, as well as the specified `demographicNo`.

      The `signatureRequestId` is used to locate the temporary signature file. The method checks if digital signatures are enabled for the current facility before proceeding. If not enabled, the method returns `null`. It also handles the case where the temporary signature file is not found, logging a debug message and returning `null`.

      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - Information about the currently logged-in user, used to determine facility and providers details.
      signatureRequestId - The ID used to locate the temporary signature image file.
      demographicNo - The ID of the demographic entity associated with the signature.
      moduleType - ModuleType The module from which the signature originated.
      Returns:
      The saved `DigitalSignature` object, or `null` if digital signatures are disabled, the file is not found, or an error occurs during processing.
